metadata.name: TARGETS
metadata.description:
With a target in sight, and a fire in our hearts,  
We set out on a journey to make a new start.  
With each step we take, and each breath we inhale,  
We push forward, determined, with a sense of valor.

Through the storms and the doubts, we keep our heads held high,  
For we know that our dreams are just within our reach,  
We may falter and stumble, but we will not fall,  
For our focus is strong, and our will is tall.

We are warriors of hope, with a cause to defend,  
With each day that passes, our progress we extend.  
We march on, unflinching, towards our ultimate goal,  
With our hearts and our minds, we will reach our soul.

So let us stay focused, and let us stay true,  
For we are destined for greatness, and our dreams will come true.  
With each step we take, and each breath we inhale,  
We will reach our target, and triumph over all.
